name: Sproutin'
description:
There are many struggles on earth made by humans, yet there are many hidden from our eyes, such is the struggle of little sprouts. Tiny as they may seen, its roots grow deep and deeper on the ground on the search for rich nutrients to grow. As the player, you will control the roots of the symbol of time, resilience and hope so it can become an astonishing tree.

WASD/Arrow Keys to play

PRESS "R" to retry level

Move the root to collect all the nutrients and go to the next stage. 

You can collide with yourself

Press SPACE to change your branch (Sprouting assets, starts on the final stages, yellow nutrient)

Credits:
Abel Marques
Vinicius Espinosa
ZebraAtomica
Otávio
